name: Offline Indicator
author: Subharanjan

sections.description: WordPress Offline Indicator uses ‘offline.js’ library to automatically alert users when they’ve lost internet connectivity, like Gmail. As soon as the browser senses the loss of the internet connection, a message is issued on the WordPress backend, giving your WP users the information that – they have lost the connection.
sections.installation:
1. Upload “wordpress-offline-indicator” zip file to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Does it display alerts on front-end of the website ?

No. This only displays messages on WordPress back-end.

short_description: WordPress Offline Indicator uses 'offline.js' library to automatically alert users when they've lost internet connectivity, like Gmail.
